UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Improving Cell Selectivity of Fowlicidin-1 by Swapping Residues between Pro-7 and Tyr-20
Literature.Author: Rajasekaran G, Kumar SD, Yang S, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=8µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=8µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(10-20% Killing=40µM)
